baseline_groups.claim_summary: Sports club vouchers (Saxony treatment) increase sports club membership. Difference-in-differences comparing Saxony to Brandenburg and Thuringia, 2006-2010.
baseline_groups.notes: Baseline: coef=0.009, p=0.635, insignificant. DID with year+state+city FE. The paper finds a null result for the behavioral outcome.

global_notes: Paper finds a null effect on sports club membership despite strong first-stage (program awareness). The 84 specs include first-stage outcomes (6 specs), alternative behavioral outcomes, heterogeneity, and placebo tests. The FE variations (pooled OLS, unit-only FE) show significance but are biased due to omitted confounders.
